Items.Title: Oversight - Supporting Providers Serving the City’s Crisis Management System (CMS).
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Supporting Providers Serving the City’s Crisis Management System (CMS).

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the mayor’s office of criminal justice to evaluate the performance of criminal justice programs that receive funding from the city
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the mayor’s office of criminal justice to evaluate the performance of criminal justice programs that receive funding from the city.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the office for neighborhood safety and the prevention of gun violence to provide training and operational support to not-for-profit service providers participating in the city’s crisis management system
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the office for neighborhood safety and the prevention of gun violence to provide training and operational support to not-for-profit service providers participating in the city’s crisis management system.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Williams and Public Advocate Williams
